content: Starter kit FX 3-KIT ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Stud Fusion is a revolutionary welding method which helps you avoid the high costs, specialist operators, inconsistency and rework associated with traditional welding Save time and labor – Stud Fusion is faster, safer and can be performed by non-specialist, trained operators. Real-time feedback on the tool makes it easier to get more reliable, consistent, and repeatable fastenings. Everything you need can be carried to the jobsite in one go. Sealing washers replace post-painting Safer jobsites and yards – this cordless welding system works entirely without heavy gas cylinders, power cords, angle grinders, fumes or light radiation Get what you spec – the smart features of Hilti Stud Fusion make repeatable and more consistent fastenings to steel easier to achieve, even under tough jobsite conditions Simplify and standardize fastening design – engineering support is available via the PROFIS Modular Support Engineering software suite, or by phone, in person or on the jobsite with Hilti Design and Engineering Support Applications Fastening to steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) for higher tensile loads or thinner base materials, and preserving the base material integrity Steel fastening in wind, oil and gas offshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and equipment fastenings Steel fastening in oil and gas onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings Power plant construction and maintenance – non-critical piping supports, fastening control and instrumentation installations, multi-disciplinary supports Shipbuilding – block alignment, fastening false ceilings, raised floors, inspection grids and manholes, water spray separators; fastening of internal and external furniture and outfitting (lamps, switches, junction boxes etc.); support for electric/piping/ventilation services ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Fastening to steel Certificates: CE Operating Temperature Range: 5° C - 40° C Technical Data | Application | Fastening to steel | Certificates | CE | Operating Temperature Range | 5° C - 40° C | Tool body weight | 27.6 lb | Weight | 27.6 lb ### ITEMS- 2293909 - Starter kit FX 3-KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x S-BT 1/4 - 5Nm Torque tool - 1x FX 3-HT_01 ROW Cordl. stud fusion hand tool - 2x X-SH F3 M10/W10 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M8/W8 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M6/W6 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M12/W12 Stud holder - 1x X-SHT F3 Stud holder change tool - 1x X-MC F3 Magnetic ground clamp assy - 1x X-GC F3 Ground cable assy - 1x Bending bar X-BB F3 - 1x Washer setting tool X-WST F3-BT - 1x FX 3 Tool case empty - 1x Sleeve
